source: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_SEQ_00<tab>Before you return to Falcon's Nest, Thierremont has a favor to ask.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_SEQ_00<tab>ハルドラス像を修繕中のティエルモンは、冒険者の動向を気にしているようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_SEQ_01<tab>Thierremont has always appreciated the kindness shown to him by Ser Ysaudore, a knight stationed at the observation post to the west known as the Anvil. For that reason, he wishes to return to her a package he believes she left behind by accident during her last visit. Deliver the package as bade and see if Ser Ysaudore recognizes it.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_SEQ_01<tab>ティエルモンから持ち主に渡してほしいと、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AA501 /var>を預かった。クルザス西部高地の金床の塔にいる「イゾドール」に、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AA501 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_SEQ_02<tab>Torn between decorum and her desire to do right by the hardworking mason, Ser Ysaudore deliberately left behind the package of extra rations, believing that Thierremont would understand her gesture. Alas, he did not, and now the food has gone to waste. As there is nothing to be done, return to Falcon's Nest and report to Ser Redwald.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_SEQ_02<tab>イゾドールに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AA501 /var>を渡した。クルザス西部高地のファルコンネストにいる「レッドワルド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_SEQ_03<tab>Tales of your various deeds have reached Ser Redwald's ears, giving him cause to applaud your initiative. However, he has not the time to thank you properly, as a sudden development has him scrambling to dispatch every able-bodied man and woman.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_SEQ_03<tab>レッドワルドに帰還の報告をした。彼の口ぶりからすると、問題が起きているようだ。準備を整えたら、再びレッドワルドに声をかけよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the ice-crusted bundle to Ysaudore at the Anvil.
TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_THIERREMONT_000_000<tab>Are you for Falcon's Nest? If so, I've a favor to ask.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_THIERREMONT_000_000<tab>これからファルコンネストに戻るのですよね？
……でしたら、ついでに頼みたいことがあるのです。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_THIERREMONT_000_001<tab>There's this knight, Ser Ysaudore, stationed at the Anvil to the west of here. She's always treated me with kindness and respect─more than I deserve, to be honest...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_THIERREMONT_000_001<tab>実は、冒険者さんが出かけた後のこと、
哨戒任務のついでにと、騎士様が様子を見に来てくれたのです。
ところが、忘れ物をしていったようでして……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_THIERREMONT_000_002<tab>Anyroad, while you were away, she came through on patrol, and I think she might have left a package behind.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_THIERREMONT_000_002<tab>彼女の名は、「イゾドール」様。
西にある監視塔に詰めておられる騎士様で、
平民である私などを気に懸けてくださる、お優しい方。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_THIERREMONT_000_003<tab>It's a bit of a detour, but would you mind returning it to her? My thanks to you, friend.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_THIERREMONT_000_003<tab>回り道にはなってしまいますが、監視塔に立ち寄り、
この「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AA501 /var>」を届けてくださいませ。
お手数ですが、よろしくお願いいたします。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_THIERREMONT_000_004<tab>You should be able to find Ser Ysaudore at the Anvil, to the west of here.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_THIERREMONT_000_004<tab>彼女の名は、「イゾドール」様。
西にある監視塔に詰めておられる騎士様で、
平民である私などを気に懸けてくださる、お優しい方。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_THIERREMONT_000_005<tab>It's not on the way to Falcon's Nest, I know, but, well...I'm fairly certain that belongs to her, and since I can't leave the Pike unattended...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_THIERREMONT_000_005<tab>回り道にはなってしまいますが、監視塔に立ち寄り、
この「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AA501 /var>」を届けてくださいませ。
お手数ですが、よろしくお願いいたします。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_YSAUDORE_000_010<tab>What's that? A package? I haven't the foggiest what you're talking about.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_YSAUDORE_000_010<tab>……なに、私が「ハルドラス像」に置き忘れた包みを、
ティエルモンに頼まれて、届けに来ただと？

source: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_YSAUDORE_000_011<tab>Confound it, that fool of a... <sigh> What a waste.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_YSAUDORE_000_011<tab>ああ、まったく……なんてことを……。
せっかくの料理が、すっかり冷めているではないか！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_YSAUDORE_000_012<tab>It was a <var 1A 02 /var>gift<var 1A 01 /var>, adventurer. Thierremont labors day and night without regard for his own well-being. At the very least, he ought to try to eat better.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_YSAUDORE_000_012<tab>これは、ティエルモンへの差し入れだったのだ。
寒い中、冷たい石像を相手に格闘する奴のために、
せめて温かな食べ物でもと思ってだな……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_YSAUDORE_000_013<tab>...Why not simply give it to him? By the Fury, have you no sense of decorum? A highborn knight cannot be seen favoring a lowborn mason in such a manner!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_YSAUDORE_000_013<tab>……なぜ直接、渡さずに置いてきたのかだと？
ば、馬鹿者、任務の最中に部下がいる前で、
平民の石工に、差し入れなどできるものか！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_YSAUDORE_000_014<tab>Nevertheless, I appreciate your concern, as well as your willingness to assist Thierremont.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_YSAUDORE_000_014<tab>いや、すまない……。
わざわざ届けてくれた貴公を、責めるのは筋違いだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_YSAUDORE_100_014<tab>May your journey back to Falcon's Nest be safe and swift. Pray give my regards to Ser Redwald.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_YSAUDORE_100_014<tab>ともかく、貴公は「ファルコンネスト」に戻るといい。
「レッドワルド」卿も、お待ちだろう。
……ただし、この事だけは内密に……頼むぞ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_YSAUDORE_000_015<tab>Caught between a pike and anvil of my own─ Oh, you're still here! Ahem, er... Pray communicate my warmest regards to Ser Redwald...and nothing else.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_YSAUDORE_000_015<tab>レッドワルド卿にも部下にも、
この事だけは内密に……頼むぞ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_REDWALD_000_020<tab>I must applaud your initiative, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Rothe tells me you have been quite busy.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_REDWALD_000_020<tab>戻ったか、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>殿。
「各施設の再建作業」……ロス親方をはじめ、
皆のために働いてくれたことを心より感謝する。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_REDWALD_000_021<tab>Alas, we have not the time to thank you properly. I have a task to which I would commit all able-bodied men and women─you and Lord Artoirel included.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA107_01586_REDWALD_000_021<tab>だが、ゆっくりと礼を言ってはいられない事態が発生してな。
どうやら、貴公の力が必要になりそうなのだ……。
